short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skips ads when you click on the extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supported Platforms: YouTube, JioCinema, Amazon Prime Video (including Freevee and MX Player content), and SonyLIV.

Enhance your streaming experience with the Better Skip Ads Button! This user-friendly extension allows you to skip ads manually with just a single click—no ad blocking required. It’s fully undetectable as an ad blocker on YouTube, ensuring uninterrupted functionality. Currently supporting YouTube, JioCinema, Amazon Prime Video (including Freevee and MX Player content), and SonyLIV, with potential for more platforms based on user requests.

Have a favorite platform in mind? Reach out to suggest new additions. Upgrade to seamless ad-skipping today with the Better Skip Ads Button!
